definition: US National Aeronautics and Space Administration/NASA
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: NASA appears to know something about this red cometary orb.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局似乎知道這個紅色慧星天體的東西。

sentences.english: National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) released the first-ever view of the whole Sun in 3-D on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局當日首次公佈了太陽全景3D圖片。

sentences.english: NASA retweeted her photo and media requests began pouring in.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局轉發了她的圖片，媒體採訪跟着蜂擁而至。

sentences.english: NASA says this image shows possible hydrate-rich terrain.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局說，這個圖片顯示可能水合物豐富的地形。

sentences.english: So NASA plans to keep searching.
sentences.chinese: 因此，美國宇航局計劃繼續不停地搜索。

sentences.english: When Bean retired from Nasa he became an artist.
sentences.chinese: 賓從美國宇航局退休後，成爲了一名藝術家。

sentences.english: However, upon checking, there was no Grossly in either the Russian or American space programs.
sentences.chinese: 可是查來查去，蘇聯或美國宇航局都沒有這麼一個人。

sentences.english: ANasa probe has sent back photographs of what appear to be trees on theplanet's surface.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局探測器發回看似星球表面樹木的照片。

sentences.english: NASA management is holding "morale events" to elevate spirits.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局正拿“道德事件”來提升士氣。

sentences.english: NASA also confirmed the sun is now leaving a notably quiet phase.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局亦證實，太陽正從休眠期中甦醒過來。

sentences.english: However, upon checking, there was no Gorsky in either the Russian or American space programs.
sentences.chinese: 可是查來查去，蘇聯或美國宇航局都沒有這麼一個人。

sentences.english: NASA image of depressions on Mars interpreted as ancient lake basins.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局的一幅被視爲古湖盆地的火星凹坑圖像。

sentences.english: ANASA image of depressions on Mars interpreted as ancient lake basins.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局的一幅被視爲古湖盆地的火星凹坑圖像。
